description: The project enables the assessment of capacity needs and analyzes national priorities to implement the major environmental conventions on biodiversity, climate change and land degradation.

subproject.description: Through assessments and analyses undertaken through this project, Kiribati will be able to identify how best to mobilize and allocate resources to implement the major environmental conventions—UNFCCC, the UN Convention on Biological Diversity (UNCBD), and the UN Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD)—in a coordinated and cost-effective manner.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Kiribati NCSA

title: Kiribati National Capacity Self Asessment
